argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tfrlem.1 | |- A = { f | E. x e. On ( f Fn x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( F ` ( f |` y ) ) ) } |
| 2 |  | tfrlem.3 | |- C = ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) |
| 3 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( F ` recs ( F ) ) e. _V |
| 4 |  | #P_funsng | |- ( ( dom recs ( F ) e. On /\ ( F ` recs ( F ) ) e. _V ) -> Fun { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( dom recs ( F ) e. On -> Fun { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_tfrlem7 | |- Fun recs ( F ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_jctil | |- ( dom recs ( F ) e. On -> ( Fun recs ( F ) /\ Fun { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) ) |
| 8 | 3 | #P_dmsnop | |- dom { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } = { dom recs ( F ) } |
| 9 | 8 | #P_ineq2i | |- ( dom recs ( F ) i^i dom { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) = ( dom recs ( F ) i^i { dom recs ( F ) } ) |
| 10 | 1 | #P_tfrlem8 | |- Ord dom recs ( F ) |
| 11 |  | #P_orddisj | |- ( Ord dom recs ( F ) -> ( dom recs ( F ) i^i { dom recs ( F ) } ) = (/) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( dom recs ( F ) i^i { dom recs ( F ) } ) = (/) |
| 13 | 9, 12 | #P_eqtri | |- ( dom recs ( F ) i^i dom { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) = (/) |
| 14 |  | #P_funun | |- ( ( ( Fun recs ( F ) /\ Fun { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) /\ ( dom recs ( F ) i^i dom { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) = (/) ) -> Fun ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) ) |
| 15 | 7, 13, 14 | #P_sylancl | |- ( dom recs ( F ) e. On -> Fun ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) ) |
| 16 | 8 | #P_uneq2i | |- ( dom recs ( F ) u. dom { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) = ( dom recs ( F ) u. { dom recs ( F ) } ) |
| 17 |  | #P_dmun | |- dom ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) = ( dom recs ( F ) u. dom { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) |
| 18 |  | #P_df-suc | |- suc dom recs ( F ) = ( dom recs ( F ) u. { dom recs ( F ) } ) |
| 19 | 16, 17, 18 | #P_3eqtr4i | |- dom ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) = suc dom recs ( F ) |
| 20 | 15, 19 | #P_jctir | |- ( dom recs ( F ) e. On -> ( Fun ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) /\ dom ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) = suc dom recs ( F ) ) ) |
| 21 |  | #P_df-fn | |- ( ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) Fn suc dom recs ( F ) <-> ( Fun ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) /\ dom ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) = suc dom recs ( F ) ) ) |
| 22 | 20, 21 | #P_sylibr | |- ( dom recs ( F ) e. On -> ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) Fn suc dom recs ( F ) ) |
| 23 | 2 | #P_fneq1i | |- ( C Fn suc dom recs ( F ) <-> ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) Fn suc dom recs ( F ) ) |
| 24 | 22, 23 | #P_sylibr | |- ( dom recs ( F ) e. On -> C Fn suc dom recs ( F ) ) |
